attributes.action: To stop the build of 1,000 plus houses in Gomm Valley High Wycombe.
attributes.background: Plans to build 1,000 plus houses in an area  of outstanding beauty. No extra funding for transport, Doctors, parking, schools. There are other builds putting pressure on this area causing densely populated. The increase of houses is for max build potential, rather than what happens to the community.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
